FERMENTABLE.NAME: Acid Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Tangy, sour flavor. Adjusts mash pH.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Amber Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Amber colored dry malt extract.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Amber Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Amber colored liquid malt extract.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Amber Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Biscuit flavor, with coffee undertones. Must be mashed.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Apples
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Fresh apples.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Apricots (pitted)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Fresh apricots with pits removed.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Aromatic Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Strong malt aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley Hulls
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Improve the speed of lautering. Neutral flavor and aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases body and produces haze.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley, Raw
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases body.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley, Torrefied
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Produces haze.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Biscuit Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Biscuit flavor and aroma.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: English ales, brown ales and porters

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Black Patent Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Roasted flavor. Imparts dry mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Black Barley
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Coffee flavor. Imparts dry mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Blackberries
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Fresh blackberries.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Biscuit flavor.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Brown ales, porters and Belgian ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Sugar, Dark
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Rich, sweet flavor.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Scottish ales, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Sugar, Light
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Rich, sweet flavor.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Scottish ales, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Candi Sugar, Amber
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases head retention. Sweet aroma.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Tripels, Dubbels, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases head retention. Sweet aroma.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Tripels, Dubbels, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases head retention. Sweet aroma. Adds some color.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Tripels, Dubbels, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cane Sugar
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Can produce flavors similar to cider.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cara-pils
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Improves head retention and body.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caraaroma
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Rich caramel flavor, red color, and malty aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used to intensify aroma and color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used to intensify aroma and color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa III
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used to intensify aroma and color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 10L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Honey-like sweetness. Light in color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 20L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Caramel, honey flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 30L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Caramel, toffee flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 40L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Caramel, toasted bread flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 60L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Full caramel flavor, toasted bread.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 80L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Bittersweet caramel, raisin flavor. Good in red colored beers.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt -120L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Bittersweet caramel, burnt sugar, and raisin flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramunich Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Toasty flavor and aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caravienne Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Light and sweet. Belgian crystal malt.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cherries (sour, pitted)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Fresh sour cherries with the pits removed.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cherries (sweet, pitted)

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Malt (US)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Nutty or chocolate flavor. Dark brown color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Malt (UK)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Nutty or chocolate flavor. Dark brown color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Rye Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Subtle roasted, toasty flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Wheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Smooth roasted flavor without astringency.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Corn Sugar (Dextrose)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used for bottle carbonation, typically 2/3 cup per 5 gallons

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Corn Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases gravity without much flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Corn, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dilutes overall malt flavor of beer.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for a dark extract recipe.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Dark Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for a dark extract recipe.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Dates (pitted)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dates with the pits removed.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Improves head retention and body.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Extra Light Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Grits
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Corn or grainy taste.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Honey
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Light sweet flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Honey Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very sweet, sometimes nutty flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Lager Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for lagers and light beers.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Light Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Lyles Golden Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases gravity without affecting flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Maple Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dry, woody flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Melanoiden Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Prominent malt character with subtle caramel flavor, similar to a decoction mash.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Mild Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Sweet malty flavor and aroma. Rich golden color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Milk Sugar (Lactose)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds sweetness and gravity.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Molasses

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt - 20L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Bready malt flavor. Orange in color.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes body, mouthfeel, haze, and head retention. Must be mashed.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye Malt

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a dry, crisp character.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Smoked Malt

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Special B Malt

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Special Roast

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Strawberries
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Fresh strawberries.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Toasted flavor. Use for improved body without sweetness.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Intense sweet flavor and dark color.

FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Biscuit or toasted flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as base or to increase gravity of any wheat beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as base or to increase gravity of any wheat beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt (Bel)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body and improves head retention. Use as a base malt, or speciality addition.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, Dark
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body and improves head retention. Use as a base malt, or speciality addition.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt (Ger)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body and improves head retention. Use as a base malt, or speciality addition.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Unmalted wheat. Increases body and improves head retention. Must be mashed.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat, Roasted
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dark roasted grain made from malted wheat. Provides chocolate flavors.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat, Torrified
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Torrified unmalted wheat. Adds body and improves head retention. Must be mashed.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: White Wheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: A more mild flavored wheat malt. Adds body and improves head retention.
